input_text:
Job Title: Full Time Field Service Technician – Anaheim/Pomona Area

Location: Anaheim, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Full Time Field Service Technician –   Anaheim/Pomona Area 

Robotics and Digital Solutions (RDS) a Division of The Hillman Group has an opening for a Full Time Kiosk Technician in the  Anaheim, CA area. 

You would begin your career with RDS as a Kiosk Technician training on key duplicating and tag engraving kiosks. The territory consists of 75-85 kiosks and is a 40 hour per week position. This position will start as base + commission(62k-68k), personal vehicle allowance and a company gas card. The territory would cover a 60-mile radius in the Anaheim area.

Benefits

 World Class Benefit plans include Health, Dental, Life-, Short- and Long-term disability insurance as well as a 401k plan!  Company vehicle, independent scheduling, and flexibility!  Wellness Program  Employee Stock Purchase Plan  Vacation/Paid Time Off/Sick Days/Floating Holiday’s  Exclusive Hillman discounts and extra perks for thousands of products, including theme parks, shows, sporting events, concerts, dinner shows, movies and much more (Tickets at Work). 

Job Description

 Primary contact with our customer locations.  Restocks kiosks, orders product, cleans, does preventative maintenance, and responds to service and repair dispatches as needed. (Typically taking 1-2 Hrs. per machine x 1-2 times per month)  The schedule for routine service calls is flexible within the week, however Saturday service is sometimes required (we are a retail company).  Unscheduled service calls are expected to be responded to in four hours with an ETA, with on-site visit within 24 hours.  Ideal for retired candidates with some technical experience. 

Responsibilities

 Re-stock and perform routine service on kiosks as needed (determined by demand at the machine, or schedule).  Perform on-call repairs or adjustments to the machine when the machine goes out of order.  Install of machines in the local area.  Monitor machines in territory daily for issues and contact stores to resolve connectivity or power issues.  Keep track of inventory for re-stocking machines that are in the Kiosk Tech’s possession.  Conduct store meetings and interact with store management on a routine basis to ensure a good working relationship with our clients and promote the machine to improve revenue.  Grow revenue in territory by optimizing machine locations, uptime, product mix, store relationships, etc. 

Skills

 Basic trouble-shooting skills  Mechanical and electro-mechanical skills  The ability to follow written and oral instructions very carefully.  Basic computer skills and basic spreadsheet and email skills are also required. 

 Training specific to the kiosks will be provided to all new employees. 

The Hillman Group is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer and will not discriminate against an applicant or employee on the basis of race, color, religion, creed, national origin or ancestry, sex, age, physical or mental disability, protected veteran or military status, genetic information, citizenship status, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, or any other legally recognized protected basis under federal, state or local laws, regulations or ordinances. The information collected by this application is solely to determine suitability for employment, verify identity and maintain employment statistics on applicants.

Apply Now

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Full Time Field Service Technician – Anaheim/Pomona Area
